notifications.title: Register to SIH
notifications.message: Smart India Hackathon (SIH) registration is now open! Don't miss this opportunity to showcase your innovation skills. Register now - Deadline approaching fast!

notifications.title: Calling Batch 2024 for Recruitment
notifications.message: Attention Batch 2024 students! We are calling for new member recruitment to join our technical club. Apply here and be part of our innovative journey!

notifications.title: See Result of Jashn-e-Aazadi
notifications.message: Results for Jashn-e-Aazadi celebration event are now available! Check out the winners and highlights from this patriotic celebration. View results

notifications.title: New Workshop: Arduino Programming
notifications.message: Registration now open for the upcoming Arduino programming workshop. Register here - Limited seats available!

notifications.title: Hackathon Results Announced
notifications.message: Congratulations to all participants! Check out the winning projects and prize distribution details.

notifications.title: New Team Member Applications
notifications.message: Applications for new team members are now open. Join our technical club and be part of innovation!
